name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior PHP Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, proficient in **PHP**, **Symfony**, and relational databases including **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **SQLite**. I excel in building scalable, high-performance solutions leveraging **ElasticSearch**, **Redis**, and **Solar** technologies in the healthcare and financial sectors. I am well-versed in agile methodologies, including **Scrum** and **Kanban**, ensuring that projects are delivered on time and meet quality standards.

My technical expertise includes leveraging domain-driven design principles and SOLID architecture for robust application development. I have substantial experience in CI/CD automation, enabling rapid deployment and improved operational efficiency. In addition to my core programming skills, I possess strong leadership abilities and a commitment to collaboration within cross-functional teams, driving initiatives that align with business objectives.
